oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: ||kabbo (Jantje) goes on a journey in a train to Simonstown. He meets a woman who stops him from falling out of the train, as well as a black man and a white man, each of whom he describes. The black man asks him where he comes from and he answers that his place is the 'Bitterpits'.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||kabbo (Jantje) in the train
